title: Cant get The worlds Pick'em summer icon.
body: I did the group picking thing, exited the launcher, re logged in and still dont have it. I really do like the icon and would very much want it, Thank you for your time.

replies.body:
Pick 'em Icons are slated to start going out mid-October, as per [our FAQ.](http://pickem.na.lolesports.com/en-US#how-to-play)

Let me know if you have any questions.
You get them usually after the first round of the Worlds tournament, not during the "pick'em" phase.
